footer.description: Discover your intelligence level with our scientific test and get accurate, personalized results in minutes.

hero.title: Discover your intelligence level in
hero.description: Scientific IQ test with accurate and personalized results. Over 100,000 people have already discovered their potential.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to discover your intelligence level
howItWorks.step1Desc: Complete 20 visual logic questions. You have 20 minutes to complete the test, take the time you need to think about each answer.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Just ‚Ç¨1.00 to unlock your result. 100% secure payment processed by Stripe. Includes 2-day premium trial.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Access your exact IQ, detailed analysis and comparison charts. Share your results on social media.

features.title: Why MindMetric?
features.subtitle: The most accurate and accessible way to know your IQ
features.validatedDesc: Our test is based on recognized psychometric principles and validated by intelligence experts.
features.usersDesc: Thousands of people trust us to discover their intellectual potential every day.
features.secureDesc: Your data is protected. Secure payment with SSL encryption and full GDPR compliance.
features.analysisDesc: You don't just get a number. Receive a complete report with analysis of your strengths and areas for improvement.
features.certificateDesc: Download your certificate and share your results on social media or with whoever you want.
features.instantDesc: Don't wait days. Get your complete result immediately after completing payment.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Simple, clear and no surprises
pricing.note: *Prices may vary depending on your country and current promotions. You will be charged in your local currency.

interestData.title: Data of Interest
interestData.subtitle: IQ averages based on millions of tests performed
interestData.note: Note: These data are statistical averages based on millions of IQ tests performed worldwide. IQ can vary significantly between individuals and is influenced by multiple factors such as education, socioeconomic environment and cognitive development opportunities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.a1: The test consists of 20 visual logic questions that assess your reasoning ability. You have 20 minutes to complete it. Once finished, you pay ‚Ç¨1.00 to see your complete result.
faq.a2: You will receive your exact IQ score, a detailed analysis of your cognitive abilities, comparison charts and an official certificate that you can download and share.
faq.a3: When you pay ‚Ç¨1.00 for your result, a 2-day premium trial is automatically activated. After that, if you don't cancel, it becomes a ‚Ç¨9.99/month subscription with access to unlimited tests and advanced analysis.
faq.a4: Yes, you can cancel at any time during the 2-day trial period with no additional charges. You can also cancel the monthly subscription whenever you want.
faq.a5: Yes, our test is based on recognized psychometric principles and has been validated by intelligence assessment experts.
faq.a6: Absolutely. We use Stripe, one of the world's most secure payment processors, with SSL encryption and full GDPR compliance.
